name: Knight of Ice
description:
Story

We live in a world where every plant has been infected. No one is safe outside. Contrary to what everyone thought, plants are now the most dangerous living form. The kingdom is ruled by the king and his 4 knights. It's all been staged by them, so they can be the only ones to control the world.

...But the king just died. 

And someone has to take the throne.

Main Character:

 

Enemies (Infected Plants):
